citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
One 4.5-year-old male ruby-colored King Charles Cavalier Spaniel (“Rusty” microchip 900020180744612) has dental
disease. There is saliva on the left side of the dog’s chin. On the upper right and upper left sides of the dog’s mouth, there
is thick grey build up where the upper teeth meet the gums, and the nearby gums are moderately swollen. The dog was
examined by the Attending Veterinarian in June 2023 and dog’s teeth were identified as needing care; a dental
appointment was scheduled for August 1, 2023 by this appointment was cancelled by the licensee.
Dental disease can cause pain and discomfort for dogs, and it may contribute to infections elsewhere in the body. Correct
by September 12th, 2023 by following the attending veterinarian’s treatment recommendations regarding this dog’s teeth.
By the time of the exit briefing, the facility had contacted their Attending Veterinarian and had set up an appointment for
an examination and dental cleaning.

citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
One 4.5-year-old male ruby-colored King Charles Cavalier Spaniel (“Rusty” microchip 900020180744612) has an issue
with his left eye. The surface of the eyeball is mildly cloudy (grey), and there is a mild buildup of brown crusts around the
edge of eye. The appearance of the eye is mildly swollen. The licensee stated that this issue had not been identified prior
to the inspection.
Daily observation of animals is important for the prompt identification of medical issues. Eye issues can get worse if not
identified and treated in a timely manner.
Correct by September 12th, 2023 by contacting the Attending Veterinarian and obtaining care for this dog’s eye issue. By
the time of the exit briefing, the facility had contacted their Attending Veterinarian and had set up an appointment for an
examination.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the owner.
n
